description.english: Enter the first stage.
description.spanish: Accede al primer nivel.
description.japanese: 最初の第一歩
description.french: Entrer dans le premier niveau.
description.brazilian: Entre no primeiro estágio.

description.english: Collect a Raspberry.
description.spanish: Consigue una frambuesa.
description.japanese: ラズベリー狩り
description.french: Ramasser une baie.
description.brazilian: Colete uma framboesa.

displayName.japanese: エキスパート フルーツコレクター

description.english: Collect 15 Raspberries.
description.french: Ramasser 15 baies.
description.spanish: Consigue 15 frambuesas.
description.japanese: 15個のラズベリーを集めた！
description.brazilian: Colete 15 framboesas.

description.english: Collect a Key.
description.spanish: Consigue una llave.
description.japanese: カギを集めてみよう
description.french: Ramasser une clé.
description.brazilian: Colete uma chave.

displayName.japanese: どこかで なにかが 開いたような？

description.english: Collect all Keys.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las llaves.
description.japanese: 全てのカギを集めた！
description.french: Ramasser toute les clés.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as chaves.

description.english: Buy an Accessory.
description.spanish: Compra un accesorio.
description.japanese: アクセサリーを買いました
description.french: Acheter un accessoire.
description.brazilian: Compre um acessório.

description.english: Make Kaneko crash.
description.spanish: Haz que Kaneko se estrelle.
description.japanese: カネコをついらくさせた
description.french: Faite avoir un accident à un Kaneko.
description.brazilian: Faça um crash Kaneko.

description.english: Get the S rank.
description.spanish: Consigue un rango S.
description.japanese: Sランクを取得しました
description.french: Obtenir le rang S.
description.brazilian: Obtenha a classificação S.

displayName.japanese: スーパーサミードリフト！

description.english: Get the S+ rank.
description.spanish: Consigue un rango S+.
description.japanese: S+ランクを取得しました
description.french: Obtenir le rang S+.
description.brazilian: Obtenha a classificação S+.

description.english: Get the Maestro rank.
description.spanish: Consigue un rango Maestro.
description.japanese: マエストロランクを取得しました
description.french: Obtenir le rang Maestro.
description.brazilian: Obtenha o ranque de Maestro.

description.english: Finish a stage with 1 second left on the timer.
description.spanish: Finaliza un nivel con sólo 1 segundo en el cronómetro.
description.japanese: 残り1秒でステージを完走
description.german: Beende ein Level 1 Sekunde bevor die Zeit abläuft.
description.french: Finir un niveau avec une seconde restante sur le timer.
description.brazilian: Termine uma fase com 1 segundo restante no cronômetro.

description.english: Get 100 Chips in a single stage.
description.spanish: Consigue 100 chips en un único nivel.
description.japanese: 1つのステージで100コインを入手しました
description.french: Obtenir 100 pièces en un seul niveau.
description.brazilian: Obtenha 100 fichas em um único estágio.

description.english: Find a secret exit.
description.spanish: Encuentra una salida secreta.
description.japanese: 秘密の出口を見つけてください
description.french: Trouver la sortie secrète.
description.brazilian: Encontre uma saída secreta.

description.english: Defeat the boss of World 1.
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe del Mundo 1.
description.japanese: ワールド１のボスを倒す
description.french: Battre le boss du monde 1.
description.brazilian: Derrote o chefe do Mundo 1.

description.english: Defeat the boss of World 2.
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe del Mundo 2.
description.japanese: ワールド２のボスを倒す
description.french: Battre le boss du monde 2.
description.brazilian: Derrote o chefe do Mundo 2.

description.english: Defeat the boss of World 3.
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe del Mundo 3.
description.japanese: ワールド３のボスを倒す
description.french: Battre le boss du monde 3.
description.brazilian: Derrote o chefe do Mundo 3.

displayName.spanish: Derrotado de una vez por todas

description.english: Defeat the boss of World 4.
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe del Mundo 4.
description.japanese: ワールド４のボスを倒す
description.french: Battre le boss du monde 4.
description.brazilian: Derrote o chefe do Mundo 4.

displayName.japanese: みどりのそうげんをクリアした！

description.english: Defeat the boss of World 1 as Vera.
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe del Mundo 1 como Vera.
description.japanese: ベラでワールド１のボスを倒す
description.german: Besiege als Vera den Boss in Welt 1.
description.french: Battre le boss du monde 1 en tant que Vera.
description.brazilian: Derrote o chefe do Mundo 1 como Vera.

displayName.japanese: アツアツのさばくをクリアした！

description.english: Defeat the boss of World 2 as Vera.
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe del Mundo 2 como Vera.
description.japanese: ベラでワールド２のボスを倒す
description.german: Besiege als Vera den Boss in Welt 2.
description.french: Battre le boss du monde 2 en tant que Vera.
description.brazilian: Derrote o chefe do Mundo 2 como Vera.

displayName.japanese: カチカチのゆきぐにをクリアした！
displayName.brazilian: Cachoeiras Frias e Congelantes está livre!

description.english: Defeat the boss of World 3 as Vera.
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe del Mundo 3 como Vera.
description.japanese: ベラでワールド３のボスを倒す
description.german: Besiege als Vera den Boss in Welt 3.
description.french: Battre le boss du monde 3 en tant que Vera.
description.brazilian: Derrote o chefe do Mundo 3 como Vera.

displayName.japanese: ようがんのうみをクリアした！

description.english: Defeat the boss of World 4 as Vera.
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe del Mundo 4 como Vera.
description.japanese: ベラでワールド４のボスを倒す
description.german: Besiege als Vera den Boss in Welt 4.
description.french: Battre le boss du monde 4 en tant que Vera.
description.brazilian: Derrote o chefe do Mundo 4 como Vera.

description.english: See the ending cutscene.
description.spanish: Mira la secuencia final.
description.japanese: エンディングのカットシーンを見る
description.french: Regarder la cinématique de fin.
description.brazilian: Assista à cutscene final.

description.english: Clear the last stage in the Starry Hall.
description.spanish: Completa el último nivel en el Salón de Estrellas.
description.japanese: ほしのバルコニーをクリアした！
description.german: Beende das letzte Level in der Sternen Halle.
description.french: Terminer le dernier niveau du hall étoilé.
description.brazilian: Conclua o último estágio no Hall Estrelado.

description.english: Clear the first stage as Vera.
description.spanish: Completa el primer nivel como Vera.
description.japanese: ベラで最初のステージをクリアする
description.german: Beende als Vera das erste Level.
description.french: Terminer le premier niveau en tant que Vera.
description.brazilian: Conclua o primeiro estágio como Vera.

displayName.english: My Heart Belongs to the Sea!

description.english: Wear the Buccaneer Hat, Shiny Hook, and Eye Patch.
description.spanish: Lleva puesto el sombrero bucanero, el gancho reluciente y el parche.
description.japanese: パイレーツハット, かがやくフック、アイパッチを身につけた
description.german: Trage den Freibeuterhut, glänzenden Haken und die Augenklappe.
description.french: Revêtir le chapeau de pirate, le crochet brillant et le cache-œil.
description.brazilian: Use o Chapéu de Corsário, o Gancho Brilhante e o Tapa-olho.

displayName.japanese: 迷宮へはロープとボムを持って

description.english: Wear the Spelunker Hat and Sturdy Mattock.
description.spanish: Lleva puesto el sombrero minero y el pico recio.
description.japanese: たんくつしゃのぼうし、つるはしを身につけた
description.german: Trage den Höhlenforscherhut und die stabile Picke.
description.french: Revêtir la casquette Spelunker et la hache solide.
description.brazilian: Use o chapéu de Explorador e o Sacho Robusto.

displayName.japanese: だれか配管工を呼んだ？

description.english: Wear the Hat of Heroes, Macho Mustache, and the Red/Blue Tint.
description.spanish: Lleva puesto el sombrero de héroes, el mostacho de macho y el tinte rojo/azul.
description.japanese: ヒーローのぼうし、ふさふさおひげ、あかとあおのボディペイントを身につけた
description.german: Trage den Hut der Helden, Macho Schnurrbart und die Rot-Blaue Färbung.
description.french: Revêtir la coiffe du héro, la moustache virile et une teinture bleue/rouge.
description.brazilian: Use o Chapéu dos Heróis, Bigode Macho e a Tinta vermelha/azul.

displayName.german: Gelobt sei der Sohn der Sonne
displayName.french: Louez soient les fils du soleil
displayName.brazilian: Louvado seja o filho dos sóis

description.english: Wear the Fashionable Nemes, Golden Beard, and Ancient Crook.
description.spanish: Lleva puesto el nemes lujoso, la barba de oro y el centro antiguo.
description.japanese: エキゾチックなぼうし、きんのひげ、ファラオのつえを身につけた
description.german: Trage die modische Nemes, den goldenen Bart und die antike Gauner.
description.french: Revêtir la némès à la mode, la barbe d'or et l'ancien sceptre.
description.brazilian: Vista o Nemés Estiloso, a Barba Dourada e o Cajado Antigo.

displayName.japanese: 真っ赤なジュースでカンパイ！

description.english: Wear the Vampire Cape and Vampire Fangs.
description.spanish: Lleva puesta la capa de vampiro y los colmillos de vampiro.
description.japanese: バンパイアのキバ、バンパイアのマントを身につけた
description.german: Trage den Vampir Umhang und die Vampirzähne.
description.french: Porter la cape et les crocs de vampire
description.brazilian: Use a Capa de Vampiro e as Presas de Vampiro.

description.english: Wear the Winter Hat and Snow Goggles.
description.spanish: Lleva puesto el gorro de invierno y las gafas de nieve.
description.japanese: ふゆようのぼうし、スノーゴーグルを身につけた
description.german: Trage die Wintermütze und die Skibrille.
description.french: Revêtir le bonnet de neige et les lunettes de ski.
description.brazilian: Use o Gorro de Inverno e Óculos de Neve.

description.english: Wear the Sentimental Tutu and Black Tint.
description.spanish: Lleva puesto el tutú sentimental y el tinte negro.
description.japanese: チュチュ、くろいボディペイントを身につけた
description.german: Trage das sentimentale Tutu und die schwarze Färbung.
description.french: Revêtir le tutu sentimental et la teinture noire.
description.brazilian: Use o Tutu Sentimental e a Tinta preta.

description.english: Wear the Viking Helmet and Flaming Sword.
description.spanish: Lleva puesto el casco vikingo y la espada flameante.
description.japanese: バイキングのぼうし、ほのおのつるぎを身につけた
description.german: Trage den Vikinger Helm und das flammende Schwert.
description.french: Revêtir le casque de viking et l'épée enflammée.
description.brazilian: Use o Capacete Viking e a Espada Flamejante.

description.english: Wear the Rainbow Rod and Rainbow Tint.
description.spanish: Lleva puesto el cetro de arcoíris y el tinte de arcoíris.
description.japanese: レインボーロッド、レインボーのボディペイントを身につけた
description.german: Trage die Regenbogenrute und Regenbogen Färbung.
description.french: Revêtir le sceptre arc-en-ciel et la teinture arc-en-ciel.
description.brazilian: Use a Haste do Arco-íris e a Tinta do Arco-íris.
